      • roundTo

        public static int roundTo(float input,
                          int rounder)
        Rounds down to a multiple of the rounder. Only works left of the decimal.
        Parameters:
        input - number to be rounded
        rounder - number input will be rounded to a multiple of
        Returns:
        input but rounded by rounder

      • roundTo

        public static float roundTo(float input,
                            float rounder)
        Rounds to a multiple of the rounder. Only works right of the decimal.
        Parameters:
        input - number to be rounded
        rounder - number input will be a multiple of, must be less than 1
        Returns:
        input rounded by the rounder

      • findAngle

        public static float findAngle(processing.core.PVector v1,
                              processing.core.PVector v2)
        Returns the angle of a line between two points om radians. Compensates for Processing y being inverted.
        Parameters:
        v1 - the first position
        v2 - the second position
        Returns:
        the angle of a line between the two positions in radians

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        by - amount to increment, must be positive

        Returns:
